//LIS  Using lower_bound/upper_bound 
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm> //// std::lower_bound, std::upper_bound, std::sort
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
      vector<int>v;
      int n,ans;
      scanf("%d",&n);
      vector<int>::iterator it; 
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
      {
            int inp;
            scanf("%d",&inp);
          //  vector<int>::iterator it;
            it=upper_bound(v.begin(),v.end(),inp);
            if(it==v.end())
               v.push_back(inp);
            else
              // v.insert(it,inp);
              *it=inp;  
      }
     /* for(it=v.begin();it!=v.end();it++)
      {    // printf("%d ",*it);
           cout<<*it<<" ";
      }
      printf("\n");*/     
      printf("%d\n",v.size());
      return 0;   
}
